import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update part supplier"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/{PartSupplierId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing part supplier record. If the supplier does not exist, it will be created (upsert behavior).

**Prerequisites**
1. **PartSupplierId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers](/docs/api/parts/list-part-suppliers) to list suppliers, extract `Items[].PartSupplierId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List suppliers: [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers](/docs/api/parts/list-part-suppliers) to find the target supplier.
2. Update supplier: [POST /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/\{PartSupplierId\}](/docs/api/parts/update-part-supplier) with new values.
3. Verify changes: [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/\{PartSupplierId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-supplier-by-id).

**Updatable Fields**: Name, AddressId.

**Minimal Required Fields**: PartSupplierId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"PartSupplierId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the part supplier to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated part supplier data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a supplier in the legacy parts management system.","properties":{"PartSupplierId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the part supplier."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this supplier belongs to."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product module identifier."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the supplier was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the supplier was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the supplier."},"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the associated address."},"Address":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Physical mailing address","properties":{"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the address"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this address belongs to"},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line"},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary address line (suite, building, etc.)"},"City":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"City name"},"State":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"State or province code"},"Zip":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Postal/ZIP code"},"Country":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Country name or code"},"Latitude":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Geographic latitude coordinate"},"Longitude":{"type":"number","format":"double","nullable":true,"description":"Geographic longitude coordinate"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the address has been when the address was last modified"}},"required":["AddressId"],"title":"Address"}],"description":"Expanded address details.","nullable":true,"type":"object"}},"title":"PartSupplier"},"example":{"Name":"IncidentIQ Demo Supplier"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
